470670.name: Subterrain - Original Soundtrack
470670.description:
In Subterrain, you fill the shoes of Dr. West, the apparent lone survivor of MPO, an underground city on Mars. Do what you must to survive: battle enemies, fight hunger and thirst, mend your wounds, and gather resources in a constant struggle to survive the catastrophe that’s beset Mars!

Subterrain - Original Soundtrack includes soundtracks that are used in the game and the trailers. They are created by professionals all over the world and we are proud to be able to present them to you!

  • Title01
  • Title02
  • Trailer01
  • Trailer02
  • Introduction
  • Credit
  • Danger
  • Introduction
  • Invasion
  • Progression01
  • Progression02
  • Progression03
  • Progression04
  • Battle01IntroEnd
  • Battle01IntroLoop
  • Battle01IntroStart
  • Battle01Main

  • Battle02IntroStart
  • Battle02Main
  • Sadness
  • Travel
470670.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 希腊语, 俄语, 繁体中文
